articles.title: Ancient DNA helps reveal social changes in Africa 50,000 years ago that shaped the human story - The Conversation CA
articles.description: A new study doubles the age of ancient DNA in sub-Saharan Africa, revealing how people moved, mingled and had children together over the last 50,000 years.
articles.content:
Every person alive on the planet today is descended from people who lived as hunter-gatherers in Africa.
